ABOUT.LABEL: WHO'S NAM?
ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.TEXT_1: Hey there, I'm Nam! With some information about yourself like what is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills? Do you learn from other challenges or do you focus on video tutorials?
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!

SKILLS.LABEL: MY STACK
SKILLS.TITLE: Skill set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Technologies I've been working with recently and am focused on mastering. I continuously track best practises and technologies and incorporate your approvals for improving your business with new technology.
SKILLS.BADGE: Also, I'm interested in diving into:

PROJECTS.LABEL: MY CRAFT
PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Encourage people to take a look and interact with your projects. Select projects that made you either proud, confident, happy or which you have learned a lot working with. Showcasing real projects and the solutions you've learnt are effective code.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POLLO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
POLLO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

BUBBLE.TITLE: DABubble
BUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

CONTACT.LABEL: GET IN TOUCH
CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to reach out to discuss projects, collaborations, or just to say hello. I look forward to hearing from you!
CONTACT.PRIVACY_TEXT_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

CHRISTIAN.TEXT: Nam significantly contributed to the on-time success of the 'Join' project with his expertise. Particularly noteworthy are his clear communication and the patience with which he explained complex code logic and worked through it together as a team. Thanks to his oversight and structured task distribution in sprints, he was a pillar of our collaboration. I value Nam as a helpful and professionally excellent colleague and recommend him without reservation.

DANIEL.TEXT: Nam was a big part of our teamwork, his positive attitude contributed a lot. Likewise, his ability to familiarize himself with new areas of work helped us greatly, and his eagerness to understand everything was a good aspect of our success.
